languages.text: "Я слышала, пусть и краем уха, молитвы, что ткачи возносят Ему. Я видела, как деяния их наполняют сердца людей уверенностью в неотвратимости гнева Его. Преданность Кровавой паутины Императору не вызывает сомнений, как и готовность отдать жизнь в борьбе с Архиврагом".

"I have heard, though only at a distance, the prayers the spinners offer up to Him. I have seen how their deeds fill the people's hearts with confidence in the inevitability of His wrath. The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is without question, as is their willingness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."
languages.original_text: "Я слышала, пусть и краем уха, молитвы, что ткачи возносят Ему. Я видела, как деяния их наполняют сердца людей уверенностью в неотвратимости гнева Его. Преданность Кровавой паутины Императору не вызывает сомнений, как и готовность отдать жизнь в борьбе с Архиврагом".

traits.locale_text: "I have heard, though only at a distance, the prayers the spinners offer up to Him. I have seen how their deeds fill the people's hearts with confidence in the inevitability of His wrath. The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is without question, as is their willingness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."
"The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is beyond any doubt, as is their readiness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."

The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is without question, as is their willingness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."

languages.text: « J'ai entendu les prières que les tisseurs Lui adressent, encore que je me sois tenue à distance, et j'ai vu la manière dont leurs agissements restaurent la confiance des fidèles en l'inéluctabilité de Sa sainte colère. La loyauté de la Toile de Sang envers l'Empereur ne fait aucun doute, de même que leur volonté de donner leur vie dans la lutte contre le Grand Ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "I have heard, though only at a distance, the prayers the spinners offer up to Him. I have seen how their deeds fill the people's hearts with confidence in the inevitability of His wrath. The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is without question, as is their willingness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu les prières que les tisseurs Lui adressent, encore que je me sois tenue à distance, et j'ai vu la manière dont leurs agissements restaurent la confiance des fidèles en l'inéluctabilité de Sa sainte colère. La loyauté de la Toile de Sang envers l'Empereur ne fait aucun doute, de même que leur volonté de donner leur vie dans la lutte contre le Grand Ennemi. »

languages.text: «He oído, aunque solo de lejos, las plegarias que los tejedores rezan en Su nombre. He visto cómo sus actos infunden la inevitabilidad de Su cólera en el corazón de las personas. La lealtad de la Red Sanguinolenta al Emperador es incuestionable, al igual que su disposición a sacrificarse en la lucha contra el Archienemigo».
languages.original_text: "I have heard, though only at a distance, the prayers the spinners offer up to Him. I have seen how their deeds fill the people's hearts with confidence in the inevitability of His wrath. The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is without question, as is their willingness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: «He oído, aunque solo de lejos, las plegarias que los tejedores rezan en Su nombre. He visto cómo sus actos infunden la inevitabilidad de Su cólera en el corazón de las personas. La lealtad de la Red Sanguinolenta al Emperador es incuestionable, al igual que su disposición a sacrificarse en la lucha contra el Archienemigo».

languages.text: “我曾远远地聆听过织网者向帝皇祷告，也曾亲眼见过他们点燃信仰的火花，让人们相信帝皇的神怒避无可避。织血罗网对帝皇的忠诚毋庸置疑。他们愿意竭尽全力对抗混沌大敌，哪怕牺牲性命也在所不惜。”
languages.original_text: "I have heard, though only at a distance, the prayers the spinners offer up to Him. I have seen how their deeds fill the people's hearts with confidence in the inevitability of His wrath. The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is without question, as is their willingness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: “我曾远远地聆听过织网者向帝皇祷告，也曾亲眼见过他们点燃信仰的火花，让人们相信帝皇的神怒避无可避。织血罗网对帝皇的忠诚毋庸置疑。他们愿意竭尽全力对抗混沌大敌，哪怕牺牲性命也在所不惜。”

languages.text: 「織り手たちが主に捧げる祈りを、遠くから聞いたことがあります。その行いが、主の怒りを避けることはできないという確信で人々の心を満たすのを見てきました。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの皇帝への忠誠心は間違いありません。渾沌の勢力と戦うためには、命さえ捨てるのですから」
languages.original_text: "I have heard, though only at a distance, the prayers the spinners offer up to Him. I have seen how their deeds fill the people's hearts with confidence in the inevitability of His wrath. The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is without question, as is their willingness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: 「織り手たちが主に捧げる祈りを、遠くから聞いたことがあります。その行いが、主の怒りを避けることはできないという確信で人々の心を満たすのを見てきました。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの皇帝への忠誠心は間違いありません。渾沌の勢力と戦うためには、命さえ捨てるのですから」

languages.text: "Ich hörte – wenn auch in einiger Entfernung – die Gebete, die die Spinner an Ihn richten. Ich sah, wie ihre Taten die Herzen der Menschen mit Vertrauen in die Unausweichlichkeit Seines Zorns erfüllen. Die Loyalität des Blutgesponnenen Netzes dem Imperator gegenüber steht außer Zweifel, genau wie seine Bereitschaft, sein Leben im Kampf gegen den Erzfeind zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "I have heard, though only at a distance, the prayers the spinners offer up to Him. I have seen how their deeds fill the people's hearts with confidence in the inevitability of His wrath. The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is without question, as is their willingness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hörte – wenn auch in einiger Entfernung – die Gebete, die die Spinner an Ihn richten. languages.text: "Uzaktan da olsa dokurların O'na ettikleri duaları işittim. Eylemlerin aracılığıyla insanların yüreklerini O'nun kaçınılmaz öfkesine güvenle nasıl doldurduğunu gördüm. Kanipi Ağı'nın İmparator'a sadakatine de Şerbaşı'na karşı savaşarak canlarını vermeye razı geldiklerine de kuşku yok."
languages.original_text: "I have heard, though only at a distance, the prayers the spinners offer up to Him. I have seen how their deeds fill the people's hearts with confidence in the inevitability of His wrath. The Bloodspun Web's loyalty to the Emperor is without question, as is their willingness to lay down their lives in the fight against the Archenemy."
